mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD_TITLE, IMG_PATH, IMG_RENAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_NO FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE, I.IMG_PATH, I.IMG_RENAME, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_CODE, B.BOARD_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON B.BOARD_NO = I.BOARD_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = 3 ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
